articles.content:

articles.title: The Base 2021 BMW 4 Series Actually Looks Good - Gizmodo Australia
articles.description: I have to admit, I rolled in here ready to walk all over the new, objectively-giant 2021 BMW 4 Series kidney grille. But you know what, it’s not so bad! Many of you will think that BMW has jumped the shark. I will admit, the spy photos were alarming. But...
